10.name: Bugs and Known Issues
10.description: Known bugs that need to be fixed.

0.name: UI/UX
0.description: Ensure the output of `draw` methods result in pretty tables and clean, descriptive output.

5.name: Modifyable Features
5.description: Implement functionality for epics and features to have their names and descriptions modifyable.

13.name: Tasks
13.description: Some stories can be broken down into smaller parts. These parts are called Tasks and they each have a name, description, status, and parent (story).

8.name: Quality of Life
8.description: A few small changes and additions that would improve the UI and UX.

12.name: Autoupdate Epic Status
12.description: Update an Epic's status depending on the status of each of its children Stories.

11.name: Ugly Table When No Epics
11.description: The table is drawn horribly and superfluosly when there are no epics to list. Replace this with a message, notifying the user that there are no epics.

3.name: Different Table Appearance
3.description: Experiment with different tables to draw the stories and epics.

9.name: New Feature Input Can be Cancelled
9.description: There is an option to cancel when creating a new epic or story.

1.name: Break Long Descriptions
1.description: Restrict the length of long descriptions to a fixed size for consistency and a cleaner look.

26.name: Create TaskDetail model
26.description: Present a Task's details similar to displaying other features.

24.name: Create Task model
24.description: A Task has the same attributes as an Epic and Story.

7.name: Modifyable Story
7.description: Stories can have their name and descriptions updated as well, when typing `u` on StoryDetail page.

27.name: Implement Page for TaskDetail
27.description: A TaskDetail can be viewed and navigated like other features.

4.name: Colored Status
4.description: Experiment with colored status options! Why does color affect the width of strings?

6.name: Modifyable Epic
6.description: Epics can have their name and description updated when using `u` option on EpicDetail page.
